content: "{\"object\":\"value\",\"document\":{\"object\":\"document\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"image\",\"data\":{\"size\":1535995,\"src\":\"https://onboarding.epam.com/app/cdn/5ec57c87-5d04-45d5-8b7d-93f1cbe4be6f/banner_1@2x.png?preview=true\",\"path\":\"https://onboarding.epam.com/app/cdn/5ec57c87-5d04-45d5-8b7d-93f1cbe4be6f/banner_1@2x.png?preview=true\",\"fileName\":\"banner_1@2x.png\",\"name\":\"banner_1@2x.png\",\"mimeType\":{\"type\":\"image\",\"subtype\":\"png\",\"parameters\":{},\"qualityValue\":1,\"wildcardType\":false,\"wildcardSubtype\":false,\"concrete\":true,\"charset\":null},\"type\":\"image\",\"id\":\"5ec57c87-5d04-45d5-8b7d-93f1cbe4be6f\",\"imageSize\":{\"width\":1055,\"height\":315.1975308641975},\"extension\":\"png\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Minsk Mobile division was formed in 2010 as a part of the Embedded department, which was then known as Low-Level Programming. And the first location for us was a lamp office in Minsk industrial area. Parallels were the first project our engineers were involved in (It was an application that users could use to manage their virtual machines) - and it was our first success! Time passed, more and more projects appeared, more and more mobile engineers joined and in 2015 Mobile division became an independent Mobile unit called BY Mobile Practice.\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"So here we go...\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"image\",\"data\":{\"size\":154388,\"src\":\"https://onboarding.epam.com/app/cdn/d7918a29-0c08-4135-8b95-aa20283c1ae7/MicrosoftTeams-image (35).png?preview=true\",\"path\":\"https://onboarding.epam.com/app/cdn/d7918a29-0c08-4135-8b95-aa20283c1ae7/MicrosoftTeams-image (35).png?preview=true\",\"fileName\":\"MicrosoftTeams-image (35).png\",\"name\":\"MicrosoftTeams-image (35).png\",\"mimeType\":{\"type\":\"image\",\"subtype\":\"png\",\"parameters\":{},\"qualityValue\":1,\"concrete\":true,\"wildcardType\":false,\"wildcardSubtype\":false,\"charset\":null},\"type\":\"image\",\"id\":\"d7918a29-0c08-4135-8b95-aa20283c1ae7\",\"imageSize\":{\"width\":960,\"height\":587},\"extension\":\"png\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-header-3\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-header-3\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Local Community  Events\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"We appreciate the culture of knowledge sharing.
